title: How to Make Reindeer Cupcakes

steps.headline: Make cupcakes.
steps.description: You can either make one according to a box or you can make one from scratch. It can be any flavor, however, chocolate may be the best choice for reindeer. See How to make cupcakes for a standard recipe.

steps.headline: Buy or make chocolate frosting.
steps.description: If you don't like chocolate, try using plain white frosting with brown food coloring added to it.

steps.headline: Spread the chocolate frosting on the cupcake.
steps.description: Do not put the frosting on like a regular cupcake.

steps.headline: Place two pretzels on the top of the cupcake.
Put two candy eyes just below the pretzels.
steps.description: Alternatively, you can put a dot of white frosting on the cupcake and a sprinkle on it.

steps.headline: Put a Nilla wafer just below the reindeer eyes.
Get any small circular red candy.
steps.description: Dip it in the chocolate frosting and put it on all of the reindeer cupcakes except for one. Of course, one cupcake needs a red nose for Rudolph. So, for his nose just dip a tiny bit of the red candy and stick it on the last cupcake.

steps.headline: Enjoy your cupcakes!
steps.description: Serve these at a Christmas dinner party with friends or relatives.

text: Make cupcakes. You can either make one according to a box or you can make one from scratch. It can be any flavor, however, chocolate may be the best choice for reindeer. See How to make cupcakes for a standard recipe. Buy or make chocolate frosting. If you don't like chocolate, try using plain white frosting with brown food coloring added to it. Spread the chocolate frosting on the cupcake. Do not put the frosting on like a regular cupcake. Place two pretzels on the top of the cupcake. Position them as reindeer antlers. Put two candy eyes just below the pretzels. Alternatively, you can put a dot of white frosting on the cupcake and a sprinkle on it. Put a Nilla wafer just below the reindeer eyes.  Get any small circular red candy. Dip it in the chocolate frosting and put it on all of the reindeer cupcakes except for one. Of course, one cupcake needs a red nose for Rudolph. So, for his nose just dip a tiny bit of the red candy and stick it on the last cupcake. Enjoy your cupcakes! Serve these at a Christmas dinner party with friends or relatives.
